default_settings.machine_start_gcode:
G28 ; Home all axes
G1 Z5 F5000 ; Lift nozzle
G1 X5 Y5 F3000 ; Move to front
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; Wait for bed temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; Wait for nozzle temp
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder
G1 Z0.2 F1000 ; Lower nozzle
G1 X60 E10 F500 ; Prime nozzle
G1 X100 E10 F500 ; Wipe
G92 E0
default_settings.machine_end_gcode:
G0 X0 Y120 ; Move to front
M190 S0 ; Turn off bed (no wait)
G92 E10 ; Set extruder to 10
G1 E7 F200 ; Retract 3mm
M104 S0 ; Turn off nozzle (no wait)
G4 S300 ; Delay 5min
M107 ; Fan off
M84 ; Disable motors
